mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CALENDAR (CAL_NO, CAL_NAME, MEM_NUM) VALUES(SEQ_CAL_NO.NEXTVAL, #{calName}, #{memNum} )
mapper.select: SELECT SCH_NO, MEM_NUM, CAL_NO, SCH_NAME, SCH_CONTENT, SCH_START_DATE, TO_DATE(SCH_END_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') + 1 AS SCH_END_DATE, SCH_START_TIME, SCH_END_TIME, SCH_COLOR, SCH_CATE FROM CAL_SCH WHERE MEM_NUM = #{memNum} OR SCH_CATE = '전사'

SELECT * FROM CAL_SCH WHERE (MEM_NUM = #{memNum} OR SCH_CATE = '전사') AND SCH_START_DATE <= TO_DATE(#{schStartDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND SCH_END_DATE >= TO_DATE(#{schStartDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') ORDER BY SCH_START_DATE, SCH_START_TIME

SELECT CAL_SCH.SCH_NO AS SCH_NO, CAL_NAME AS CAL_NO, SCH_NAME, SCH_START_DATE, SCH_END_DATE, SCH_START_TIME, SCH_END_TIME, SCH_CONTENT, SCH_CATE FROM CAL_SCH LEFT JOIN CALENDAR USING(CAL_NO) WHERE CAL_SCH.SCH_NO = #{schNo}
SELECT SCH_NO, MEM_NUM, CAL_NO, SCH_NAME, SCH_START_DATE, TO_DATE(SCH_END_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') + 1 AS SCH_END_DATE, SCH_COLOR FROM CAL_SCH WHERE (MEM_NUM = #{memberNum} OR SCH_CATE = '전사')
SELECT * FROM CAL_SCH WHERE SCH_CATE = '전사' AND SCH_NO = (SELECT MAX(SCH_NO) FROM CAL_SCH WHERE SCH_CATE = '전사')
